########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND pulsed_power_daq_sources
    digitizer_source.cc
    # picoscope_4000a_source_help_impl.cc
    picoscope_4000a_source_impl.cc
    picoscope_base.cc
    power_calc_ff_impl.cc
    mains_frequency_calc_impl.cc
    power_calc_cc_impl.cc
    power_calc_mul_ph_ff_impl.cc )


set(pulsed_power_daq_sources "${pulsed_power_daq_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT pulsed_power_daq_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT pulsed_power_daq_sources)


add_library(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq SHARED ${pulsed_power_daq_sources})

#set(picoscope-ps4000a "/opt/picoscope/lib/libps4000.so")
#add_library(picoscope-ps4000a SHARED "/opt/picoscope/lib/libps4000.so")

target_link_libraries(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq 
#"-Wl,--whole-archive picoscope-base.a -Wl,--no-whole-archive"
gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime )#picoscope-ps4000a)

target_include_directories(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )


#target_include_directories(picoscope-ps4000a
#    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:/opt/picoscope/include/libps4000a>
#    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
#  )

set_target_properties(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq 
#picoscope-ps4000a 
PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_pulsed_power_daq_EXPORTS")
set_target_properties(
    #picoscope-ps4000a 
    PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

# link_directories(${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)


########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq)

########################################################################
# add picoscope
########################################################################
#set(PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME ps4000aTargets)
find_package(picoscope)
message("PICOSCOPE_LIB_DIR  " ${PICOSCOPE_LIB_DIR})
#add_library(ps4000a SHARED ${PICOSCOPE_LIB_DIR} )
add_library(picoscope SHARED IMPORTED)
set_target_properties(picoscope PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION ${PICOSCOPE_LIB_DIR})
target_link_libraries( gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq picoscope)

#set_target_properties(ps4000a PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_pulsed_power_daq_EXPORTS")
#set_target_properties(picoscope PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
#target_link_options(gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq PUBLIC "-Wl,--whole-archive $<TARGET_PROPERTY:ps4000a> -Wl,--no-whole-archive" )

#install (TARGETS ps4000a EXPORT picoscopeLib DESTINATION ${CMAKE_MODULES_DIR}/pulsed_power_daq)
#export(TARGETS ps4000a FILE ${PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME}.cmake)
#install(TARGETS ps4000a EXPORT ${PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME} LIBRARY DESTINATION lib/)
#install(EXPORT ${PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME} FILE ${PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME}.cmake DESTINATION cmake/)
#message(${PS4000A_EXPORT_NAME}.cmake)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)



# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_pulsed_power_daq_sources
qa_power_calc_mul_ph_ff.cc
qa_power_calc_ff.cc
qa_mains_frequency_calc.cc
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-pulsed_power_daq)


if(NOT test_pulsed_power_daq_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_pulsed_power_daq_sources)


message("deps: ${GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS}")
if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
    #include(GrPlatform)
    find_package(gnuradio-blocks PATHS ${GR_PREFIX}/lib64/cmake/gnuradio/)
    find_package(gnuradio-analog PATHS ${GR_PREFIX}/lib64/cmake/gnuradio/)
    link_directories(
	    ${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS}
	    ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_DIRS}
	)
    foreach(qa_file ${test_pulsed_power_daq_sources})
        string(LENGTH ${qa_file} qa_file_length)
        math(EXPR truncated_filename_length "${qa_file_length} - 6")
        string(SUBSTRING ${qa_file} 3 ${truncated_filename_length} truncated_qa_file)
        set(target_to_build "test_${truncated_qa_file}")
        add_executable(${target_to_build} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file})
        
        message("created target: ${target_to_build} ")
        target_link_libraries(
            ${target_to_build}
            ${GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS}
            Boost::unit_test_framework
            #${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES}
            gnuradio-runtime
            gnuradio-blocks
            gnuradio-analog
        )
        add_dependencies(${target_to_build}  ${GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS} Boost::unit_test_framework ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
        set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS  "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -O0")
        set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -O0")
        set_target_properties(${target_to_build} 
            PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "BOOST_TEST_DYN_LINK;BOOST_TEST_MAIN"
        )
        setup_target_for_coverage_gcovr_html(NAME "test_${truncated_qa_file}_coverage" 
                                            EXECUTABLE ${target_to_build}  ctest
                                            DEPENDENCIES ${target_to_build}  ${GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS}
        )
        add_test(NAME "ctest_${truncated_qa_file}"
                COMMAND ${target_to_build} 
        )
        
    endforeach(qa_file)
    append_coverage_compiler_flags()

endif(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
